content: pattern for a turtle duck inspired by avatar the last airbender difficulty level intermediate this can be made in any size depending on the yarn and hook you use my sample came out to 4 x4 5 x3 using worsted weight yarn and an h hook there are links in the pattern to tutorials for the more advanced techniques used stitches used chain magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase and decrease foundation single_crochet slip_stitch picot this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own translations welcome if you make this pattern and post the finished product elsewhere please credit me questions compliments concerns leave a comment
